reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress fits well, with one noting it hits right above the knee, and appreciate its flattering design that accentuates curves. The fabric receives positive feedback for being thick, warm, and not itchy, while customers like its rich purple color. The length receives mixed reviews, with some finding it perfect while others say it's a bit short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect LBD, in all colors!
items.body: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS DRESS!!! I've recently lost weight, and I normally wear medium tops, and XS pants. After reading the reviews, I opted to order this dress in a small, and it fits perfectly, like it was made for me! The material is fantastic, and it is very stretchy and comfortable. One tip, though- Be sure to wear Spanx or another very good foundation garment, because this one will show every little bump and imperfection! I'm ordering another one today in Hot Pink! ðŸ©· Read more
items.author: Judy S. Spradley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater Weather! Beautiful dress.
items.body: For reference, I am 5â€™0 and 140lbs, 36C. I bought it in black, size medium, itâ€™s ribbed as well and it fits like a glove. It sits right above my knees and on my petite form it is difficult to find dresses that do so. It hugs my person perfectly and in all the right places. Form fitting not like other sweater dresses. I will be pairing it w fleece lined off black tights and tall 3.5 inch black pointed boots. I am very pleased with my purchase only drawback it went on sale shortly after my purchase and I couldâ€™ve saved $9 on it haha. I highly recommended it, you wonâ€™t be disappointed. Read more
items.author: DrG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and warm
items.body: Absolutely LOVED this dress, very comfortable, good fabric. I am 5'7, 129lbs, got the small and it felt that it covered enough to wear to church. I also have very long legs. It does show it all to those wondering. Read more
items.author: Elara Flores

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Definitely hugs the curves. Great color.
items.body: This is a great dress, especially for the price. I ordered the wine color, and it is a lovely darker red (my favorite!) It is much heavier than I expected. Not thick, just a heavy knit - it literally feels weighty when you hold it, but doesn't feel heavy when wearing. The ribbed knit is very form-fitting and shows every curve, which was what I was going for. Falls a few inches above the knee, which I also like. Great with leggings, tights, or none of the above! The cowl neck required a little adjustment and washing to get it to slump the way I like, but no complaints really. Warm, comfy, and sexy. Highly recommend, as long as you are comfortable with body-hugging dresses. Read more
items.author: L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the holidays
items.body: Good fit, length is right above the knee. Better quality and thick fabric than expected. Great value for the price and color matched the description Read more
items.author: Rachael

The hem is about 4â€ above the knee same as model in the ad. The one thing I was looking for was a tag to indicate what side was the back, but I noticed there was a flattering design in the front knit cabling (ðŸ”¥extra bonus!) that indicated it was the front. I canâ€™t wait to wear this! Read more
items.author: G. G.

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Jadeblue, Dark Grey, Black, Coffee, Lightgrey, Softgrass, Orange, Baby Blue, Plum, Green 2, Morandi Pink, Lakeblue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
